data.name: Title
data.value: AI Learning Lab

data.name: Subtitle
data.value: Experience AI technology evolution from top to bottom. Each level solves the previous level's problem!

data.name: L1_Title
data.value: ğŸ’¬ Pure LLM Chat

data.name: L1_Desc
data.value: Basic: Ask AI directly, no configuration

data.name: L1_Placeholder
data.value: Try: "What is the return policy?"

data.name: L1_Problem
data.value: âš ï¸ Problem: No role setting, responses may deviate from business needs

data.name: L1_Arrow
data.value: â¬‡ï¸ Solved by adding System Prompt

data.name: L2_Title
data.value: ğŸ­ System Prompt

data.name: L2_Desc
data.value: Give AI identity: "You are an e-commerce customer service, 7-day return, free shipping over 500"

data.name: L2_Placeholder
data.value: Ask "return policy" again, compare the difference

data.name: L2_Solution
data.value: âœ… Solved: Consistent identity and expertise

data.name: L2_Problem
data.value: âš ï¸ New Problem: Output format is not fixed, hard to process programmatically

data.name: L2_Arrow
data.value: â¬‡ï¸ Solved with Few-shot examples

data.name: L3_Title
data.value: ğŸ“ Few-shot Learning

data.name: L3_Desc
data.value: Teach AI fixed output format (JSON) with examples

data.name: L3_Placeholder
data.value: Enter review: "terrible" "not bad" "awesome!"

data.name: L3_Solution
data.value: âœ… Solved: Fixed output format, can be processed programmatically

data.name: L3_Problem
data.value: âš ï¸ New Problem: Each conversation is independent, no memory of previous context

data.name: L3_Arrow
data.value: â¬‡ï¸ Solved by adding conversation history

data.name: L4_Title
data.value: ğŸ§ Chat Memory

data.name: L4_Desc

data.name: L4_Solution
data.value: âœ… Solved: Multi-turn conversation coherence

data.name: L4_Problem
data.value: âš ï¸ New Problem: AI only knows training data, no real-time information

data.name: L4_Arrow
data.value: â¬‡ï¸ Solved with Function Calling
